50 /* save old LIXA_TRACE_MODULE and set a new value */
51 #ifdef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE
52 # define LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE LIXA_TRACE_MODULE
53 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE
54 #else
55 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE
56 #endif /* LIXA_TRACE_MODULE */
57 #define LIXA_TRACE_MODULE LIXA_TRACE_MOD_COMMON_CONFIG

208 typedef guint8 md5_digest_t[MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH];
212 typedef char md5_digest_hex_t[MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1];
213 
214 
215 
220 union lixa_job_u {
221  struct {
222  char config_digest[MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2];
223  char separator;
224  char source_ip[LIXA_JOB_SOURCE_IP_LEN];
225  char terminator;
226  } fields;
227  char raw[LIXA_JOB_RAW_LEN];
228 };
229 
234 typedef union lixa_job_u lixa_job_t;

296  static inline void lixa_job_reset(lixa_job_t *job) {
297  memset(job->raw, ' ', LIXA_JOB_RAW_LEN - 1);
298  job->raw[LIXA_JOB_RAW_LEN - 1] = '\0'; }
299 
300 
301 
308  static inline const char *lixa_job_get_raw(const lixa_job_t *job) {
309  return job->raw; }
310 
311 
312 
320  int lixa_job_set_raw(lixa_job_t *job, const char *raw_job);
321 
322 
323 
330  static inline void lixa_job_set_config_digest(
331  lixa_job_t *job, const char *config_digest) {
332  strncpy(job->fields.config_digest, config_digest,
333  MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2);
334  job->fields.terminator = '\0';
335  }
336 
337 
338 
345  int lixa_job_set_source_ip(lixa_job_t *job, int fd);
346

350 }

355 /* restore old value of LIXA_TRACE_MODULE */
356 #ifdef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE
357 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE
358 # define LIXA_TRACE_MODULE LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE
359 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE
360 #endif /* LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE */
